mapper.select: SELECT cno, cname, id, sgenre, descr, savename FROM ( SELECT cno, cname, id, sgenre, descr, savename, ROWNUM rno FROM ( SELECT c.cno cno, cname, id, NVL(gnr, 'empty') sgenre, NVL(descr, 'empty') descr, savename FROM collection c, member m, imgfile f WHERE c.isshow = 'Y' AND m.isshow = 'Y' AND c.mno = m.mno AND c.cno = f.cno(+) AND f.isshow(+) = 'C' AND f.whereis(+) = 'C' ORDER BY cdate DESC, cno DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}

SELECT cno, cname, id, sgenre, descr, savename FROM ( SELECT cno, cname, id, sgenre, descr, savename, ROWNUM rno FROM ( SELECT c.cno cno, cname, id, NVL(gnr, 'empty') sgenre, NVL(descr, 'empty') descr, savename FROM collection c, member m, imgfile f WHERE c.isshow = 'Y' AND m.isshow = 'Y' AND c.mno = m.mno AND c.cno = f.cno(+) AND id = #{cid} AND f.isshow(+) = 'C' AND f.whereis(+) = 'C' ORDER BY cdate DESC, cno DESC ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startCont} AND #{endCont}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM collection c, member m WHERE c.mno = m.mno AND m.isshow = 'Y' AND c.isshow = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM collection c, member m WHERE c.mno = m.mno AND c.isshow = 'Y' AND m.isshow = 'Y' AND id = #{cid}
mapper.update: UPDATE collection SET isshow = 'N' WHERE cno = #{cno}
